flavorText:
"There is no such thing as scrap metal. All such material can be repaired with the proper bonding agent."
—Quennus, metallurgeon

foreignData.flavorText: „Metallschrott gibt es eigentlich nicht. Mit dem richtigen Bindemittel kann alles wieder repariert werden." —Quennus, Metalldoktor
foreignData.name: Urmaterie-Pulver
foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, opfere das Urmaterie-Pulver: Bringe eine Artefaktkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: "No existe el metal inservible. Todos esos materiales pueden ser reparados con el componente adecuado." —Quennus, metalúrgico
foreignData.name: Polvo de protomateria
foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, sacrificar el Polvo de protomateria: Regresa la carta de artefacto objetivo de tu cementerio al juego.

foreignData.flavorText: « Rien n'est jamais bon pour la ferraille. Tout peut être réparé à condition d'avoir l'agent liant adéquat. » —Quennus, métallurgien
foreignData.name: Poudre de protomatière
foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, sacrifiez la Poudre de protomatière : Renvoyez en jeu la carte d'artefact ciblée de votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non esistono i rottami di metallo. Un tale materiale può essere riparato con il legante appropriato." —Quennus, metallurgo
foreignData.name: Polvere di Protomateria
foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifica la Polvere di Protomateria: Rimetti in gioco una carta artefatto bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 「屑鉄なんてものは存在せんよ。 どんなものだって、きちんとした修復材があれば直せるんだ。」 ――機械医師のクェナス

foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, 原始物の粉を生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚を対象とし、それを場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: "Nenhum metal precisa virar sucata. Todos esses materiais podem ser reparados com a solda apropriada." — Quennus, metalurgião
foreignData.name: Pó da Protomatéria
foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifique Pó da Protomatéria: Devolva o card de artefato alvo de seu cemitério para o jogo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Нет такого понятия, как металлолом. Даже самый негодный материал можно починить с помощью правильного крепителя». — Квеннус, врачеватель металла
foreignData.name: Порошок Протовещества
foreignData.text: {4}{W}, {T}, пожертвуйте Порошок Протовещества: верните целевую карту артефакта из вашего кладбища в игру.

foreignData.flavorText: 「没有所谓的废铁。 只要有所需的结合触媒，这些东西全都可以修好。」 ～金属医师昆奈斯

foreignData.text: {4}{W}，{T}，牺牲原质粉：将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。

name: Protomatter Powder
originalText: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Protomatter Powder: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to play.

rulings.text: The only difference between a colored artifact and a colorless artifact is, obviously, its color. Unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact requires colored mana to cast. Also unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact has a color in all zones. It will interact with cards that care about color. Other than that, a colored artifact behaves just like any other artifact. It will interact as normal with any card that cares about artifacts, such as Shatter or Arcbound Ravager.

You can’t sacrifice Protomatter Powder to return itself to the battlefield. First you choose the target (at which time it’s still on the battlefield), then you pay the costs (at which time you sacrifice it).

text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Protomatter Powder: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
